text: kraoyomk yeung ban banhchoun banda anakneasar robsa yeung chea b nd banteab . real pel del anakneasar ban mokadl brachacheate noh puokke tengte bdeseth nung ke . haey yeung ban thveu aoy puokke vineasa a nd reay chea b nd banteab haey yeung ban thveu aoy puokke klay tow chea rueng niyeay t knea( samreab anak chomnean kraoy pichearna) . dau che neah vineasa a nd reay haey champoh krom del kmean chomnue
